projects.name: Update-Golang CLI
projects.description: A CLI tool to automate updating Go installations on Linux. Fetches the latest version, removes the old one, and installs the new one seamlessly.

projects.name: POSCOMP-Lab
projects.description: A responsive platform to simulate POSCOMP exams. Users can practice with previous exam questions, with or without time limits.

projects.name: Vacation Backend Application
projects.description: A backend application enabling users to share and explore vacation photos, highlighting beautiful and travel-friendly places worldwide.

projects.name: Notify
projects.description: A Golang application for GitHub repository notifications. Users can set up webhooks to receive email alerts about repository changes.
